DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Methods for rendering the image urls and extra information (incomplete)

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the link to the image as to put it in the src attribute of the <img> tag.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the attributes for the <img> tag specific for the wrapped image, i.e., the string src="{image url}" width="{real width of the (scaled) image}" height="{real height of the (scaled) image}".

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The correct source set entry for the currently wrapped image as string, i.e., "{image url} {image width}w".

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The source set wrapped by the image bean as string in the format required by the srcset attribute of the <img> tag.
